---

title: "Enroll a user in a class using a class code."
description: "This endpoint enables users to enroll in a class using a valid class code.  The class code is a unique identifier for each class."

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Enroll a user in a class using a class code."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/accounts/{accountid}/enroll-with-classcode"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint enables users to enroll in a class using a valid class code.  The class code is a unique identifier for each class.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"accountid","in":"path","description":"The unique identifier for the user's account.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Request body containing the required data for class enrollment.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["class_code","ext_role","ext_user_id"],"type":"object","properties":{"ext_user_id":{"minLength":1,"type":"string"},"ext_first_name":{"minLength":1,"type":"string"},"ext_last_name":{"minLength":1,"type":"string"},"ext_parent_id":{"type":"string"},"ext_username":{"type":"string"},"ext_email":{"minLength":1,"type":"string"},"ref_id":{"type":"string"},"ext_role":{"type":"string","enum":["student","teacher"]},"class_code":{"minLength":1,"type":"string"},"address":{"type":"object","properties":{"country":{"type":"string"}},"title":"UserAddress"}},"title":"EnrollInClassBody"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful enrollment. Returns enrollment details.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["entities"],"type":"object","properties":{"entities":{"type":"array","items":{"required":["dls_account_id","dls_org_id","ext_user_id","space_key","space_org_context","space_role","space_title","space_type","status"],"type":"object","properties":{"ext_user_id":{"type":"string"},"space_title":{"type":"string"},"space_key":{"type":"string"},"dls_account_id":{"type":"string"},"dls_org_id":{"type":"string"},"space_org_context":{"type":"string"},"space_role":{"type":"string"},"space_type":{"type":"string"},"visibility":{"type":"boolean"},"dls_teacher_id":{"type":"string"},"status":{"type":"string"}},"title":"UserSpaceEntityInprocess"}}},"title":"JoinSpacesResp"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
